calculatorTitle: CSS Clamp() Calculator — Generate Responsive Values Instantly
description1: This function calculates the most acceptable values for adaptive reduction/increase of sizes.
description2: Suitable for font sizes, indents, block sizes...
description3: To calculate in rem, just set the value in the "Pixels per rem = " field
exampleBlockDescription: The block size, inner and outer margins, font size and corner radius dynamically adapt to the change of the browser window size.
minWidthError: Minimum width cannot be greater than or equal to maximum width
percentWarning: !!! Percentages have been added in test mode. In some cases, this may lead to incorrect calculation.
